OcrDocumentScanResult.name: OcrDocumentScanResult
OcrDocumentScanResult.description: Represents the contents of a document after optical character recognition (OCR) processing.

ContentVersionId.description: Unique identifier for the current version of the data.

DocumentRequestId.description: Unique identifier for a document request.

ExtractedValues.description: Data extracted from the document. Data type StringPlusClob, maximum length 131072. Note This field is encryptable with Salesforce Platform Encryption.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OcrService.description: Records the service that performed the text extraction.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the OcrDocumentScanResult record.

PageNumber.description: The page number of the scanned document result in the original document that it’s a part of.

Rotation.description: Degrees of rotation requested. Can be 0, 90, 180, or 270.
